capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Hagrid's love for his pets. He's got a special way with them, and they just adore him in return. I mean, who wouldn't want to spend their free time surrounded by Hippogriffs and Thestrals? It's really quite endearing.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of things does hagrid own?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's possessions, and it seems like he has a pretty interesting collection. I mean, who wouldn't want to own a three-headed dog? It's definitely not something you see every day. Luwei is such an unusual name for a pet, but I suppose it suits the dog's unique personality. I'm quite certain that Hagrid loves his three-headed dog dearly, and I can imagine he'd do anything to protect it.
I've heard that Hagrid's three-headed dog, Luwei, is quite a handful. I mean, it's not every day you see a creature with three heads running around Hogwarts. (Sentiment: amusement)
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is luwei?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that can be confirmed.
